amendment.description: Amendment redirects $14,523,544,000 with in the Department of Education's grants to states under the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) to support funding for special education.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease by $14,523,544,000 the Department of Educations grants to states under the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) to support funding for special education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Craig amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 376 - 41 (Roll no. 309).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Craig amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 376 - 41 (Roll no. 309).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A060) offered by Mrs. Craig.
